message1.msg: Hey everyone! Does anyone have tips for preparing for the Morgan Stanley co-op interviews?

message2.msg: I found that practicing behavioral questions with a friend helped me a lot. Also, research the company culture beforehand.

message3.msg: For technical interviews, definitely brush up on data structures and algorithms. LeetCode is your friend!

message4.msg: Has anyone gotten offers from HubSpot? How competitive is the application process for their co-op program?

message5.msg: HubSpot was really friendly in my experience. They value cultural fit a lot, so show enthusiasm and teamwork skills!

message6.msg: Quick question: Does anyone know if we can list freelance projects on our Northeastern co-op profile?

message7.msg: Yes, you can! Just make sure to highlight the skills and outcomes relevant to co-op roles.

message8.msg: Anyone interested in doing a mock interview session this weekend? Could help prep for multiple companies.

message9.msg: Iâ€™m in! We could split into pairs and rotate questions. Should we use Zoom or Teams?

message10.msg: Heads up: I just uploaded a new set of co-op tips to the community board. Check it out and comment if you have feedback!

communityMessage1.msg: Welcome to the HubSpot community! Feel free to share co-op experiences and tips.

communityMessage2.msg: Has anyone interviewed with HubSpot recently? What were the questions like?

communityMessage3.msg: The technical round focused on React and API integrations. Brush up on hooks!

communityMessage4.msg: Don't forget to showcase your teamwork skills, HubSpot values collaboration.

communityMessage5.msg: Thanks everyone! This is super helpful for my upcoming interview.

directMessage1.msg: Hey, can we schedule a 1:1 about the interview?
